movie.title: Roman J. Israel, Esq.
movie.description_intro: ROMAN J. ISRAEL, ESQ. is a dramatic thriller set in the underbelly of the overburdened Los Angeles criminal court system. Denzel Washington stars as Roman Israel, a driven, idealistic defense attorney who, through a tumultuous series of events, finds himself in a crisis that leads to extreme action. Colin Farrell costars as the monied, cutthroat lawyer who recruits Roman to his firm.
movie.description_full: ROMAN J. ISRAEL, ESQ. is a dramatic thriller set in the underbelly of the overburdened Los Angeles criminal court system. Colin Farrell costars as the monied, cutthroat lawyer who recruits Roman to his firm.

movies.title: Painless
movies.summary: Henry Long desperately seeks a cure for the condition that leaves him unable to feel physical pain.
movies.description_full: Henry Long desperately seeks a cure for the condition that leaves him unable to feel physical pain.
movies.synopsis: Henry Long desperately seeks a cure for the condition that leaves him unable to feel physical pain.

movies.title: Chills Down Your Spine
movies.summary: Jeff finds a new lamp in hopes of finding Sabiah only to discover her little sister Mahktoonah. The two then go on an odyssey to find and free Sabiah from a deranged killer while telling various horror stories to pass the time.
movies.description_full: Jeff finds a new lamp in hopes of finding Sabiah only to discover her little sister Mahktoonah. The two then go on an odyssey to find and free Sabiah from a deranged killer while telling various horror stories to pass the time.

movies.title: Fear of Clowns 2
movies.summary: Shivers the Clown is back with a vengeance in this sequel to the Lionsgate hit video from 2004! And the ante is upped when he's back with two new psychotic clowns to help him kill Lynn Blodgett. But Detective Peters, the man who put Shivers away, is also back, and this time he doesn't want the clown behind bars...he wants him six feet under!
movies.description_full: Shivers the Clown is back with a vengeance in this sequel to the Lionsgate hit video from 2004! movies.title: The Thing
movies.summary: Paleontologist Kate Lloyd is invited by Dr. Sandor Halvorson to join his team who have found something extraordinary. Deep below the Antarctic ice, they have found an alien spacecraft that has been there for perhaps 100,000 years. Not far from where the craft landed, they find the remains of the occupant. It's cut out of the ice and taken back to their camp but as the ice melts, the creature reanimates and not only begins to attack them but manages to infect them, with team members devolving into the alien creature.
